net.i2p.crypto

Class RSASigningPrivateCrtKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.i2p.data.SimpleDataStructure
      • net.i2p.data.SigningPrivateKey
        • net.i2p.crypto.RSASigningPrivateCrtKey
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Destroyable, DataStructure

    final class RSASigningPrivateCrtKey
extends SigningPrivateKey
    A SigningPrivateKey that retains the Chinese Remainder Theorem parameters, so it can be converted back to a Java CRT key. By preserving the CRT parameters across a Java to I2P to Java conversion, we speed up signing by about 3.3x, and the parameters are correctly serialized in PEM format when stored to a keystore. The CRT parameters are NOT retained when this object is serialized via getData().
    Since:
    0.9.31
